Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

Interface ConnectionRegistryEndpoint

All Known Implementing Classes:
HBaseServerBase, HMaster, HMasterCommandLine.LocalHMaster, HRegionServer, MiniHBaseCluster.MiniHBaseClusterRegionServer
@Private public interface ConnectionRegistryEndpoint
Define the necessary method for carrying ClientMetaService.
